pullrequest.title: Added the ability to split ramps.

content.raw: @ReneKolb @PhyNerd I want to echo the comments above: We really need to see an minimilistic working example (a minimal labscript experiment) that demonstrates the error with the previous labscript version and doesn't demonstrate the error with the suggested patch before we can merge such a large change in.
